Package ispd.motor.workload.impl

Class PerNodeWorkloadGenerator

java.lang.Object
ispd.motor.workload.impl.task.TaskBuilder
ispd.motor.workload.impl.RandomicWorkloadGenerator
ispd.motor.workload.impl.PerNodeWorkloadGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkloadGenerator
public class PerNodeWorkloadGenerator extends RandomicWorkloadGenerator
Generates a workload for a single master node in a GridQueueNetwork.
Some particularities:
  • This class generates computation and communication sizes with instances of TwoStageUniform, but used as single stage uniforms.
  • This class generates task creation times from an exponential distribution with beta = 5, which may be adapted if the task's owner has id "NoDelay". See makeTaskCreationTime() for details.
See Also:
  • TwoStageUniform
  • RandomicWorkloadGenerator
  • Distribution.nextExponential(double)

  • Constructor Details

    • PerNodeWorkloadGenerator

      public PerNodeWorkloadGenerator (String application, String owner, String schedulerId, int taskCount, TwoStageUniform computation, TwoStageUniform communication, IntSupplier idSupplier)
      Create a per-node workload generator with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      application - workload's originating application
      owner - id (name) of the user who owns the workload
      schedulerId - id of the machine which the workload will be directed to
      taskCount - total number of tasks
      computation - TwoStageUniform for the computation size
      communication - TwoStageUniform for the communication size
      idSupplier - supplier of ids for the generated tasks. Must supply at least taskCount ids

  • Method Details

      idSupplier - supplier of ids for the generated tasks.

      an instance created from the given List of attributes.

    • makeTaskList

      public List<GridTask> makeTaskList (GridQueueNetwork qn)
      Generate tasks as configured, all targeted to the first master found with id matching the one in schedulerId. If no appropriate master is found, this method returns an empty ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      qn - GridQueueNetwork with the master that will host the GridTasks.
      Returns:
      List of GridTasks, configured for the correct master, or an empty ArrayList, if the GridQueueNetwork has no master with the correct id.

    • getType

      public WorkloadGeneratorType getType()
      Returns:
      WorkloadGeneratorType.PER_NODE
      See Also:
      • WorkloadGeneratorType

    • formatForIconicModel

      public String formatForIconicModel()
      The iconic model format for this workload generator consists of:
      • The scheduler (node) id
      • The RandomicWorkloadGenerator.taskCount
      • The configuration for computation and communication (respectively) distributions for task size. Only the interval minimums and maximums are outputted, since during generation the distribution acts as a single stage uniform one.
      Returns:
      iconic-model fitting string representation of how the generator is currently configured.
      See Also:
      • TwoStageUniform

    • toString

      public String toString()
      The string representation for this workload generator includes is task count, application, owner, scheduler id, and distributions for generating computation and communication sizes.
      Specified by:
      toString in interface WorkloadGenerator
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:

    • makeTaskCreationTime

      protected double makeTaskCreationTime()
      The task creation time generation involves an exponential distribution, with beta = 5, and possibly an added delay depending on the task owner's id.
      Specified by:
      makeTaskCreationTime in class TaskBuilder
      Returns:
      task creation time (in seconds), to be used to make a new task.

    • toVector

      public Vector<String> toVector()
      Build a Vector with data from this instance, in the following order:
      1. application
      2. owner
      3. schedulerId
      4. RandomicWorkloadGenerator.taskCount
      5. RandomicWorkloadGenerator.computation's interval maximum
      6. RandomicWorkloadGenerator.computation's interval minimum
      7. RandomicWorkloadGenerator.communication's interval maximum
      8. RandomicWorkloadGenerator.communication's interval minimum
      The order of attributes must be kept consistent between this method, the method fromTableRow(List, IntSupplier), and how the load configuration window represents instances of this class in a table.
      Returns:
      Vector with this instance's data.
      See Also:
      • TwoStageUniform
